items.name: Mushoom in Chilli Cashew Gravy
items.description: A delicious and flavorful vegetarian dish that combines mushrooms with a rich and creamy gravy made from cashews and various spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Boti Gravy
items.description: A flavorful and succulent South Asian dish consisting of tender chicken pieces (boti) marinated in aromatic spices and cooked in a rich and savory gravy, making it a delicious and satisfying meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Masala Vade
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with a flavorful blend of chana dal, spices, and herbs, deep-fried to golden perfection, resulting in a crispy and savory treat that is perfect with tea or as a side dish. (4 vade)

items.name: Tamarind Rice
items.description: Rice mixed with tamarind juice, peanut and spices, topped with curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Nadru Yakhni
items.description: A Kashmiri dish made with lotus stem (nadru) cooked in a creamy and aromatic yogurt-based gravy. The lotus stem is simmered in a flavorful combination of spices, ginger, fennel seeds, and bay leaves, along with a generous amount of yogurt, which lends a rich and creamy texture to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Aab Ghost
items.description: A traditional Kashmiri lamb curry known for its fiery spiciness and bold flavors, cooked with a blend of indigenous spices, creating a mouthwatering and aromatic dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Papad Churi
items.description: A traditional Rajasthani dish made with crushed papad (thin, crispy lentil wafers) mixed with spices, onions, tomatoes, and other ingredients, creating a crunchy and tangy accompaniment

items.name: Aloo Ki Thechwani
items.description: A traditional dish from the Indian state of Uttarakhand, made with boiled potatoes and a blend of spices, including red chili and mustard oil, creating a rustic and spicy potato curry. Served with a portion of rice

items.name: Boror Tenga
items.description: A delightful vegetarian dish with lentil  fritters, retaining the tangy and flavorful broth made with tamarind, resulting in a delicious and satisfying vegetarian version of this traditional Assamese curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Til Diya Murgi
items.description: A delectable Indian dish where succulent pieces of chicken are coated in a rich and nutty sesame seed marinade, creating a delightful combination of flavors and textures.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer or snack known for its spicy and flavorful taste. It is made with bite-sized pieces of chicken, typically marinated in a blend of spices such as red chili powder, turmeric, ginger-garlic paste, and other aromatic seasonings. The marinated chicken is then deep-fried until crispy and golden

items.name: Litti Chokha
items.description: A traditional dish from the Indian state of Bihar. It consists of baked balls made of whole wheat flour and stuffed with a mixture of roasted gram flour, spices, and herbs and served with a side of mashed potatoes and eggplant, along with a tangy tomato and onion chutney.

items.name: Masoor Pulao
items.description: A fragrant and nutritious one-pot rice dish made with aromatic spices and red lentils (masoor dal), creating a wholesome and flavorful meal. served with a side of raita + pickle

items.name: Beary Biryani
items.description: A traditional and flavorful rice dish hailing from the Beary community in coastal Karnataka, featuring fragrant Basmati rice, tender lamb, and a blend of aromatic spices, creating a mouthwatering and distinct biryani experience. Served with yogurt raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Aloo Corn Tikki
items.description: A delicious and flavorful Indian appetizer made from a mixture of mashed potatoes, sweet corn, and various spices, formed into patties and shallow-fried until golden brown, resulting in a crispy and mouthwatering snack. (4 tikki)

items.name: Green Peas Pulao
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish prepared with basmati rice and green peas. The rice is cooked with aromatic spices, onions, and peas, resulting in a vibrant and delicious pulao.

items.name: Veg Chili Garlic Noodles
items.description: Delicious and spicy Asian-inspired dish featuring stir-fried noodles, mixed vegetables, and a tantalizing chili garlic sauce, creating a perfect balance of flavors and textures.
items.extra: make it into a combo meal with veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Chilli Garlic Noodles
items.description: A delectable Indo-Chinese dish featuring stir-fried noodles, succulent chicken pieces, and a delightful combination of garlic and chili, offering a perfect balance of savory and spicy flavors.
items.extra: make it into a combo meal with chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Masala Bhaat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato, and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander

items.name: Fully Booked
items.description: Unfortunately, I am unable to take any orders on this day

items.name: Onam Sadya for 2
items.description: A traditional vegetarian feast served during the festival of Onam, which is one of the major festivals celebrated in the state of Kerala. The sadya consists of the following items :  rice, sambar, mambazha kutan, beans thoran, cabbage thoran, olan, pachadi, inji puli, achar, banana chips, perpu pradaman, paal paysum (kheer), papadam. (Serves 2 people). Check the Onam Sadya page above to learn more.

items.name: Regular Veg Meal
items.description: A regular meal portion from the onam sadya with choice of 1 thoran (beans or cabbage), 1 curry (sambar or mambazha kutan). Served with rice, papadam and inji puli.
items.extra: add a dessert (paal payasam or perpu pradaman)

items.name: Palak Chana Masala
items.description: Chickpeas cooked in spinach gravy with onion, tomato and fresh ground spices topped with fresh cream.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Palak Chicken
items.description: A delightful Indian curry that harmoniously blends tender pieces of chicken with vibrant spinach, creating a flavorful and nutritious dish enriched with aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Corn Pakoda
items.description: A savory Indian snack where fresh corn kernels are coated in a spiced chickpea flour batter and deep-fried to golden perfection, creating a crispy and flavorful treat (6 pakodas)

items.name: Mix Dal Kichidi
items.description: A comforting Indian dish prepared by combining a variety of lentils and rice, cooked with aromatic spices, resulting in a flavorful and nutritious one-pot meal.

items.name: Bharwa Bhindi
items.description: A popular Indian dish where tender okra pods are stuffed with a flavorful blend of spices and herbs, then cooked to perfection, resulting in a delicious and aromatic vegetable delicacy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Salmon in Coconut Curry
items.description: A delectable fusion of flavors, featuring succulent salmon fillets simmered in creamy coconut milk infused with aromatic herbs and spices, creating a harmonious and indulgent seafood dish
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Rajma Tikki
items.description: A north Indian street food dish made by mashing cooked red kidney beans and then forming them into patties, which are shallow fried. Served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Misal Pav
items.description: A popular street food in Maharashtra, made with a spicy mixture of sprouted beans, vegetables in a savory broth called "kat". It is served with 2 pav and topped with chivda & farsan (fried snacks).

items.name: Paneer Makhni Biryani
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a thick creamy buttery gravy of onion, tomato, cashew, ginger and garlic and then layered with aromatic basmati rice, caramalised onion, coriander, mint and slow cooked. Served with a side of yogurt dip + papad

items.name: Lamb Yakhni Pulao
items.description: A delicious and aromatic rice dish that is popular in Indian and Pakistani cuisine. The dish is made with tender lamb that has been slow-cooked in a flavorful broth (yakhni) made with aromatic spices and yogurt. The lamb and yakhni are then combined with fragrant basmati rice and cooked until tender, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying meal. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Papad Paneer Roll
items.description: Fusion snack where crumbled paneer (Indian cottage cheese) is encased in a crispy papad shell, offering a delightful combination of textures and a burst of flavors (4 pieces)

items.name: Keerai Molagutal
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish made with spinach cooked in a creamy coconut gravy, seasoned with aromatic spices, resulting in a wholesome vegetarian curry. Served with rice.
